description.value:
You've learned how to expand your magical tricks with a set of specially prepared charms or runes, which you gain as a secondary tool. You gain a 1st-rank common occult spell and a 2nd-rank common occult spell as innate spells, each of which you can cast once per day. At 8th level, you also gain a 3rd-rank common occult spell as an innate spell which you can cast once per day.

Reinforced You gain an additional common innate spell of a rank equal to or less than the highest-rank innate spell you have from slayer feats, which you can cast once per day. This additional spell must be of the trophy's tradition, and you can swap it for a different spell with the same restrictions when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.rr-playtest-actions.Item.Wagb9XE34NpQQ8yy]{Reinforce your Arsenal}.
